venue.address_2: see map at end of announcement
venue.name: Building 4, Room 370

item.description:
Please RSVP!

FEATURE TALKS: Trading Currencies by Mamoud Sadre and Market Talk by Eric from Vermont

Trading Currencies by Mamoud Sadre

Mamoud Sadre is a member of our group. His financial engineering is deep and he enjoys trading currencies. It is his currency trading that is the subject of this talk.

Topics Mamoud will cover:
  • Overview of currency trading marketplace
  • Spot market
  • Currency futures
  • Currency options
  • Currency forwards

  • Currency trading concepts, factors and formulas




Mamoud Sadre developed a patent pending methodology for construction of semi-structured products for risk management in manufacturing. He founded FTS Electronic Marketplace. His most recent product is an application that uses a currency index as a factor in an asset pricing model. He has a blog at NewAgeEconomics.




Market Talk led by Eric from Vermont

Eric will give the market perspective this month. Since early September he has repeatedly, and precisely, expressed the prediction that we would have an Elliot Wave 4 - a screeching down market. He expressed it at the talk by Basil in the beginning of September, then again at the September Wednesday meeting and then again at the October 2 Levels meeting. At the Levels meeting he was adamant that looking at bases for longs was a waste of time and that the bases showing up now were primarily in the short ETFs and double short ETFs.

In the future we will have more variety in our market talks, each month hearing from a variety of people.


BOSTON TIGER PRE-MEETING:
This premeeting will cover a recent Tom O'Brien volume analysis where Tom predicted recent price action. We will compare it to other recent Tom O'Brien predictions.

The Boston Tiger Meeting of the Tiger Financial Network meets starting at 5:30 PM. Go to http://www.tfnn.com/b... to see the full announcement. For questions, see Bob Podd at bpodd@softwareresults.com.


The agenda:
6:00 - 6:50 Pre-Meeting with Boston Tigers, led by Bob Podd
7:00 Introduction, Announcements, Polls by Doug
Market Talk led by Eric from Vermont
Stockpicks
Trading Currencies by Mamoud Sadre


To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....
or send email to DouglasWRoberts@gmail.com.

To join in our virtual trading, go to this link for instructions and signup links:
http://groups.google....

If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you!

Make your own decisions about investing your money. Investment ideas and recommendations made in our meetings and our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.

Directions to Building 4, Room 370 (within MIT campus)
MIT Map: http://whereis.mit.ed...
Walk down Amherst Street, cross Ames Street and keep walking straight on the sidewalk. When there is a door on the left, enter it. (To the left should be the entrance to Hayden Library.) Turn to the right and walk until the 2nd stairwell. Go up to the 3rd floor and enter room 370.
item.name: The Boston Investor's Business Daily Wednesday Meeting
